entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023
